caption.title: The maps used to estimate extinction risk of microendemic species of seed plants in Brazil
caption.p: (a) phytogeographic domains ( IBGE, 2004 modified by Silva, Leal & Tabarelli, 2017); (b) fifth-order watersheds ( www.metadados.ana.gov.br); (c) cumulative habitat loss in 2014 ( IBGE, 2017); (d) Regional Climate Change Index (RCCI).
Click here for additional data file.
